comments.raw_text: After clicking the Edit button on a previously uploaded file, it's possible to edit the Title, the size of the thumbnail, and the tags.  There is not, however, an obvious way to edit the description of the file.
comments.creator: richard@mozilla.com
comments.author: richard@mozilla.com
